docs.title: Google Drive Downloader
docs.text: This is a simple script that is used in a docker container or ran locally. This script watches a directory in google drive and download the file locally. When downloaded it deletes the file.

docs.title: Docker Usage
docs.text: In pycharm use the googleDriveDownloader.dockerfile run config.

docs.title: Run as Script
docs.text: In Pycharm use the downloader - local run config.

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text: Nothing is saved to servers. You control where this is run, and where you save the files from drive.
